meanings.definition: The quality or state of being valiant.
meanings.sent1: Her valiantness in the face of danger inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent2: The valiantness of the knight in the story was admired by all.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her valiantness in protecting her friends was unmatched.
meanings.sent4: The valiantness of the firefighter rushing into the burning building was like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The valiantness of the soldier charging into battle will be remembered for generations.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of showing courage or bravery.
meanings.sent1: His valiantness during the rescue mission saved many lives.
meanings.sent2: The valiantness of the explorer facing unknown dangers was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The valiantness of the squirrel trying to steal food from the bird feeder was comical.
meanings.sent4: Her valiantness in confronting her fears was like a light in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The valiantness of the student speaking up against injustice was truly inspiring.
